vision.notes: Sensory capabilities of Microstomidae flatworms are largely unknown based on provided context. Vision presence/absence is not specified.

mechanoreception.notes: As free-living flatworms in meiobenthos and plankton, mechanoreception is inferred to be common for interacting with their environment.

chemoreception.notes: As free-living flatworms, chemoreception is inferred to be common for finding food and navigating their environment.
